Work.title: Everise
Work.description: We helped Everise revamp their digital platform with a user-centric approach, simplifying workflows and enhancing engagement across all touchpoints.

data.title: About and aim
data.para: Everise partnered with us to modernize their legacy user interface and streamline operational flows. Our aim was to create an intuitive and scalable experience that improves efficiency for internal teams and satisfaction for customers.

data.title: About and aim
data.para: The redesign addressed key usability pain points, integrating seamless navigation and clean visual hierarchy to ensure users can perform actions with minimal effort and maximum clarity.

Work.title: Amazon
Work.description: Redesigning Amazon’s internal logistics dashboard to improve performance tracking, reduce friction, and boost productivity across the supply chain.

data.title: About and aim
data.para: Amazon's internal logistics tools required a UX uplift to match their fast-paced environment. We focused on designing a responsive and role-based dashboard to provide key metrics at a glance for different stakeholders.

data.title: About and aim
data.para: By conducting targeted user interviews and workflow analysis, we aligned our solutions with actual user needs—streamlining repetitive actions and improving decision-making speed.

Work.title: Flipkart
Work.description: We collaborated with Flipkart to overhaul the user onboarding experience, resulting in faster conversions and increased retention across mobile and web platforms.

data.title: About and aim
data.para: Our project with Flipkart focused on refining the user onboarding process. We redesigned the entry journey to minimize cognitive load and increase user confidence right from the first interaction.

data.title: About and aim
data.para: We introduced adaptive interfaces and contextual guidance, which reduced drop-offs significantly and helped users complete their first purchase more efficiently.

Work.title: Google
Work.description: Enhancing accessibility and design coherence across Google’s internal design system by aligning visual language and improving cross-team usability.

data.title: About and aim
data.para: We assisted Google in consolidating multiple design variants into a unified system. The objective was to ensure accessibility compliance while improving scalability across multiple product teams.

data.title: About and aim
data.para: By introducing flexible components and strict design guidelines, we empowered teams to build consistent, accessible, and performant user interfaces faster and more efficiently.
